pr_title: Add isLeader check for Leader only events

timeline.message:
Merge pull request #1 from linkedin/master

Pull latest
Add isLeader check for Leader only events

timeline.bodyText:
Instead of repeating this check in multiple handle methods, I think it would be better to have just a single check in handleEvent(). This would also allow us to identify all leader-only events by looking at that one method.
I suggest caching _adapter.isLeader() in a local instead of calling it twice to avoid situations where the value of the underlying variable might have changed between the two calls.
